The claim made by President Donald Trump: 6 percent growth in the nation's real gross domestic product for the second quarter of 2017 being a number that nobody thought they'd see for a long period of time.
The fact that real GDP growth was higher: 6 percent in eight of the last 18 quarters, according to data from the Bureau of Economic Analysis.
